name: Rewinder
description:
Rewinder is a first-person runner game with a time travel mechanic.
The objective of the game is to escape from an abstract prison by travelling through different worlds connected by portals. To open them, the player must collect collectables set in acrobatic levels.
In the long run, the player will aim for the highest score on each level, and for the overall time spent playing. The less time he spends to finish a level, the better his score will be.

name: Hippy Skate
description: A new style of skateboarding game using a simple two button mechanic. Tap the left side of your screen to make your skater move. Hold the left side of your screen to make your skater stop. hold the right side of your screen to make your skater crouch. Release the right side of your screen to make your skater Ollie. Crouch on a downhill to give your skater a boost of speed. Release at the right time on an up hill to make your skater launch higher into the air.

name: Exit Mask
description: Inspired by obsessive thought patterns and the compulsions that come with them, Exit Mask is an experimental art game where your biggest threat is yourself. Depicted in grainy black-and-white, this project details the experience of being plagued with ceaseless intrusive thoughts and the struggle to coexist with the uglier side within.

To Kill A Black Swan is not your average whodunit, nothing is as it seems to be, it is all about superficiality and beneath the surface it has an important message to tell.

name: Koufuku Sousakan
description:
Set in a modern town created in a virtual space in Japan in the near future, this is a simulation game that aims to liberate 100 people who have become immobile and to give happiness to all. The player acts as an officer in charge of managing the virtual space, and aims to normalize the people he or she contacts while observing the life of any "avatar" living there, to protect the avatar from frequent attacks by obstructionists, and to collect and redistribute the feelings of happiness and unhappiness that they emit, in order to achieve a certain level of happiness for all people. Avatar behavior changes in response to happiness and can be influenced by other avatars involved in life. That is, even with the same avatar, life can change depending on the degree of happiness of the other avatars that are actively acting or negatively distressed by the sense of well-being during observation, or are involved with or in contact with other avatars that were previously offline. The interaction between people is called "human scramble" on the package and official website. Each avatar lasts about 20 minutes, and you can watch the same avatar over and over again.

The whole story is represented by 3DCG, but the avatar is represented by flat shading (a projection method that looks like an angular figure with fine planes). Avatar conversations and thoughts are expressed as text, and their voices are expressed as indistinct voices.

name: A New Don
description:
Fia grew up on her mother's hog farm, always dreaming about running away to the bustling city that dotted the horizon.

Just when she thinks this is all her life will ever be, a letter comes in the mail from an old eccentric man she used to call "Grandfather".

He asks her to come to the city so that he may give her something. When she gets there, it turns out that his gift is the ownership of his crime family!

But not everyone is excited to see Fia and internal tensions threaten to tear the family apart.

Can you survive the 6 days it takes to inherit the family?

Become the new Donna, or die trying.

name: Stray Souls
description:
Enter a world of nightmares in this third person, action-horror, inspired by the classics of the genre. Fight terrifying creatures, solve mind-bending puzzles, and unravel a horrid family secret to expose the chilling truth behind your existence.

Unlock the secrets hidden within the haunted town of Aspen Falls, featuring gruesome enemy encounters, epic bosses, cunning puzzles, and a deep story where not everyone is who they seem. Play as Daniel – an average teenager whose life is forever changed after inheriting the home of his estranged grandmother and meeting a mysterious woman with intimate knowledge about his family, the house, and its shocking connection to his past. The gameplay elements inspired by classic horror combat with souls-like precision, put a fresh spin on the modern action-horror genre.

description: A turn-based tower defence game inspired by Japanese folklore.

name: Zest & Goop
description: A tower defence game with a twist. Made for Ludum Dare 39.

name: Oak Defenders
description: You play as Gobby the tree goblin. You are endowed with the position of the almighty Oak Defender. You must protect the mighty enchanted oak from the surrounding forest creatures. You must keep the tree alive or it will die and the forest will become corrupted.

name: Boxing Surgery Simulator 2000
description: Confessions of a Corner Cutman

name: Orkicidium
description: We came in peace (or not)

name: Alpha Squirrel
description: Rescue the stranded squirrels from the forest fire!

name: Sector Alpha
description: Protect the galaxy from an invading army aboard your fighter ship in an arcade space shooter.

name: Silent Ruins
description: Explore the ancient ruins and uncover its treasures and secrets in this narrative idle clicker game

name: Battle Zone: Clicker
description: Top-Down Clicker Shooter

name: Mystfed
description: A Short Horror Game with Clicker-style about feeding a Mysterious Monster lurking in the dark

name: Ardilous
description: Uncover international spies in this investigative text puzzle game inspired by the classic Carmen San Diego.

name: Diatris
description: Skewed Tetris

name: Woofice Chair!
description: Welcome to Goodboi Park! Help the park defenders defend it from body-builders with their swivelling chairs!

name: Rosie's Inn
description: Welcome to Rosie's Inn, a prototype featuring just a taste of the business behind questing in a fantasy world.

name: Lexicontainer
description: Brain bending word puzzler!

name: Record Scratch Fever
description: A kitty rhythm game at a fishy club!

name: Hexagon Hamlet
description: A casual building game for highscore hunters

name: Voices of a Hidden Star
description: Sin descripción

name: Violent Cheese Crusader
description: A great dragon attacks the castle and it's up to you as a tough crusader to save... the princess' holy cheese collection! Grab your loyal sword and shield and face the massive dragon... to collect the cheese bit by bit!

name: Endless Pursuit
description: Survive the endless pursuit of dangerous enemies.

name: Dactylographe
description: Survivre face à une machine à écrire possédée

name: What Now?
description: Digital Existential Expressionism

name: Quaterneo
description: Atmospheric action puzzle game.

name: Butterfly Collector
description: Butterfly Collector is a point-and-click adventure game inspired by escape rooms, Myst, and fantastical gardens. Play as a captured butterfly hybrid looking for a way to heal her broken wings.

name: A Broken City
description: There is no one here anymore, yet the trains continue to run.

name: Noise Snke
description: Noise Snke is a classic Snake game that writes its board state directly to your sound card. It is harsh and experimental. Headphones recommended only for the strong of heart.

name: Let There Be Cat!
description: Play as a cat, run around and break stuffs!

name: Meow Nights
description:
Two cats get lost on a magic and cloudy dungeon while looking for some delicious sky fish. They will have to find 5 fish each and then make their way towards each other, so they can go home and have a cozy sleepover.

There is a catch, however. The cats cannot see each other. For that reason, they have to follow their friend's "meow" ability so they make their way to the same room, after catching their share of snacks.

Once this happens, both cats must "meow" so they can free themselves from the cloudy dungeon.

name: Festival of the Spirit
description: a tenderfoot prologue

name: The Dust Below
description: The horizon is a haze of polluted ash.

name: Cat or Ice Cream?
description: Think you can tell the difference?

name: Cleaning Service
description: Cleaning Service is a short 3D horror adventure game.

name: Coming Back
description: A short psychological horror game

name: Delirious
description: a short 3D horror game

name: The Shiny Ones
description: Healing focused tower defense

name: Fruit Thieves
description: Defend your garden against fruit thieves

name: Nightmare Nursery
description: Run your own small boutique of nightmares

name: Station Master
description: The only winning move is not to play

name: DualForce Idle

name: Breaktory

description: Click your way to wealth and riches

description: Build - Automate - Defend

name: Lord Clicker

name: Submarine Samurai
description: Shred submarines with your battleship using explosives and powerups

name: All Humans Must Die!
description: Try to kill as many humans as possible...in 60 seconds!

name: Waifu Wars Splash
description: Choose your favorite waifus and let the war begin!

name: 17 Fighters
description: Deck-building card game, defeat 17 fighters one by one!

name: Hocus Pocus Prince
description: Otome visual novel where boys are cursed into "beasts."

name: Hidden Cats
description: Find and rescue cats!

description: Survive the last minutes as a Dictator Cat

name: Phoebe Flingle Finger
description: Life ain't easy for Phoebe Flingle Finger. Point her through a rough day.

name: Princess Miyumi and The Necro's Dungeon

name: Hot Garbage: A Keysmash Story
description: an interactive fiction game, and #4 in the keysmash series

name: Riffle Effect

name: Battle Gem Ponies
description:
A super-powered, shapeshifting pony RPG.

Command a super-powered, shape-shifting pony in this RPG Adventure! In a world where unpredictable legendary beasts pose an existential threat, you'll embark on a journey across the Pinto region to become the best pony tamer in the world and protect your magical companion from those who want to use her as a secret weapon.

Customize your team with hundreds of different moves, stat arrangements, & collectible battle gear to gain the upper hand in this rapid-switchout Rock/Paper/Scissors combat system.

A years-in-the-making love letter to the My Little Pony & Pokémon communities, celebrating one year of progress since the successful Kickstarter campaign!

name: Dungeonlike
description: Turn based roguelike with an advanced health system

name: City of Scrap
description: A Metroidvania set in a Steampunk World

name: Monochrome Valentine
description: Manga-style Romance Visual Novel!

description: A cringe heist at the Sixtine Chapel museum

name: Corn Mission
description: Is a platform puzzle game with 2 different zones and 100 levels with more than 15 objects all with different mechanics

name: Oblivion Congee
description: An illustrated Twine game about congee, memory, and reincarnation.

name: Neutrois
description: A nonlinear interactive novel speculating on life in a postgender world.

name: South Scrimshaw
description: A science-fiction visual novel in the style of a nature documentary.

name: B-Sides
description: A queer journey of discovery, doubt, and the paranormal

name: Openbound Online
description: Roleplay or fill the entire place with perfectly generic cubes. Why not?

name: A Red Sky at Dawn
description: An interactive murder mystery set in 1941 Singapore.

name: Love Verne
description: Ludum Dare 46 Submission

name: Harbinger's Horse GT
description: Beat your rival in a thrilling race!

description: Become the richest pimp in the neighborhood Demo version

description: Steal the faces of your city's inhabitants

description: Help young Quinlan complete his patrol in the dangerous forests of the Western Deep in this short adventure game!

description: Loot, upgrade and teleport with the Chicken Sword!

name: Dartford Street
description: Sin descripción

name: Slamslide
description: A neon rogue(very)lite runner.

name: Dread the Rabbit
description: Journey across the land and reclaim your throne

name: Bottomless
description: Discover the depths of antarctica and find the missing pieces of an old machine.

name: Dead Man Shooting
description: Wild and fast roguelite run & gun western action. X to Shoot, Z to Jump

name: Potions, Frankly
description: Frank is hiring!

name: In the Grave Wood
description: A short visual novel about warrior women who live in a swamp.

name: Aftermath
description: In Aftermath, players follow Charlie's journey through an unfamiliar European city, searching for her daughter and fighting not only an unearthly presence, but also her own demons.

name: Noble Fates
description: A 3D Fantasy Kingdom Sim driven by intelligent characters with a rich simulation of opinions and memories. Build, Craft, Farm, Mine, Hunt, Defend, and more! Command from the sky or take control in third person as your story goes where the people, your actions, and their reactions take it.

name: Emergents Trading Card Game
description: Emergents: Trading Card Game (also known as Emergents TCG) is an innovative digital trading card game where you own the cards. Capture the magic of the golden era of comics! Build your deck with a team of unique characters, superheroes and villains, across five distinct factions, and get ready to smash your opponents as you battle across the streets of Culverton.

name: Super Mario Flash 2
description:
Super Mario Flash 2 (mostly known as SMF2) is the second and, for now, the last game developed by Pouetpu on Pouetpu-games site, being released in 2011. Super Mario Flash 2 was pretended to be a sequel of its predecessor "Super Mario Flash". The game design is now based on "Super Mario World" game (made by Nintendo) with some little features from other Mario games.

Like its predecessor, Super Mario Flash 2 also includes a level editor where players can make their own levels and share them.

name: Mason and Strings
description: Mason needs Strings' help to learn how to play guitar so she can perform at the Castle Concert. Travel around Hub City to collect music sheets, solve puzzles, and interact with the many inhabitants! With Strings, you can grapple between platforms and play different chords using the Chord Wheel! Enjoy exploring a lively world and becoming a master musician!

name: Cut the Rope: Blast
description: Sin descripción

name: Om Nom Solitaire
description: Sin descripción

name: Smilinguido: Desafio na Floresta
description:
The time has come!
Get a closer look at Smilingüido. Take part in a dangerous and fun adventure. Test your skills and limits inside the Brazilian forest. The challenge is great. The difficulties and dangers are enormous, but the mission is worth it.
Face the challenge and discover the great lesson that Jesus has to teach you, whom he loves and cares for!

name: Impious Pumpkins
description: Impious Pumpkins is a cute/spooky real time tactics game where you take control of your own ghostly army to defend their resting places from hordes of evil pumpkins!

name: Cloud Escape
description:
Cloud Escape is a fast-paced 3D precision platformer with countless traps, obstacles and cool movement mechanics. Whether you're dashing through the large, themed areas in Classic Mode or trying to climb to the top in the new game mode: The Tower.
Both game modes have their own worlds with unique challenges, traps, secrets and collectibles. In the new tower, you'll even encounter real enemies for the first time!

name: Super Mumtaz Bros.
description: In Super Mumtaz Bros. you join the titular plumbing brothers on their mission to rescue Princess Sana from... chickens?

name: Over My Dead Body
description: Over My Dead Body is a local multiplayer game where your goal is to be the first to die. Heal the others! Damage yourself! Kick the bucket! Goofy characters, fun stages and an overall colorful and cartoonish style come together to make up a fast-paced gameplay to share with friends.

name: Mobile Suit Gundam U.C. Engage
description:
Mobile Suit Gundam U.C. ENGAGE is a Universal Century War simulation game that brings together Gundam's Universal Century works.
You can enjoy a digest with animation of Universal Century works developed in past TV anime, movie, OVA, etc., and a new story of Universal Century that combines animation and battle / adventure.
In the simulation battle, you can perform powerful 6vs6 battle with realistic 3D mobile suits with simple operation / auto play, and you can feel the battlefield of the Universal Century.
Experience the history of the battle of the Universal Century with Mobile Suit Gundam U.C. ENGAGE, a Gundam mobile game that expands and deepens the Universal Century!

name: Master Detective Archives: Rain Code
description: A brand new dark fantasy detective action game from the minds behind the Danganronpa series! Yuma, an amnesiac detective-in-training, and Shinigami, the spirit haunting him, tackle unsolved mysteries in a strange city caged by unending rain.

name: Freetime Event: Poolside Edition
description: A Super Danganronpa 2 fangame about a freetime event with Komaeda Nagito.

name: Freetime Event: Theatrical Release
description: See A Movie With Komaeda Simulator at the theater located on Jabberwock's Third Island.

name: Super String
description:
Recruit and train a variety of unique Agents
and lead them to battle in Super String, an RPG that maximizes the fun of collecting and strategizing.

Take up the mantle of Commander, lead a team of webtoon super heroes,
and save humanity from the clutches of a formidable foe!

name: Momotype
description:
The monotype, an off-shoot virtual pet, is being play-tested by members of your company. You have been selected.

An experimental, retro take on tamogotchi-lite games. Will you fulfill Momo's needs or does he need something greater?

name: Implements of Hell
description: Implements of Hell is a first-person psychological horror game. Explore the mysteries, unlock the secrets, and change the outcome in a slow-paced atmospheric, and extremely horrifying experience.

name: Zombie Daisuki
description: Real-time strategy game where you must command a hord of zombies to complete each stage.

name: Ricochet Ranger
description: A top down arena shooter with only one bullet.

name: 3D Ultra Cool Pool
description: Do you love a good game of pool? Cool Pool has all your favorites - Eight Ball, Rotation, Cutthroat, Nine Ball, and Classic Pocket Billiards - on dazzling tables with a super-easy interface and with the option to use standard balls and custom balls. But Cool Pool also has five totally original "cool" games that'll curl your cue and which can be played both on a standard or a differently shaped "cool" table. They give pool a whole new angle of strategy, surprise, and fun!

name: Queue Simulator
description: Queue simulator brings you your favorite part of MMORPG experience - waiting in Queue!

name: The Citizen
description:
The Citizen is a series of single-player mods for Half-Life 2, set in a storyline parallel to the original game.

Originally released in November 2007 and re-released in February 2008.

name: Mission Improbable
description: Mission Improbable is a singleplayer mod for Half-Life 2: Episode 2. In it, Gordon Freeman is tasked with re-activating a Resistance listening post. From there, things quickly escalate.

name: Espionage: Mafia Evolved
description: A free-to-play social deduction game for PC and mobile devices in which you attempt to find your adversaries hidden amongst the other players. Set in 1958, role-based play rewards those who rely on strategy and their creative instincts.

name: Google Text Adventure
description: Easter egg Google game found by searching "text adventure" on Google.

name: Latish Destroyer
description:
Latish Destroyer is the game where you dynamically and fast destroy the corporation of one man - Latish.
You will meet multiple enemy types, which Latish's laboratories made especially to kill you, The Destroyer.
This game consists of 6 levels, where you have to complete the objective of it. Simply run through level destroying enemies and do some little activities. You are playing as a cool Dota 2 player named Roman.

name: Wolfpack Island
description: Explore an island, meet others wolves in a multiplayer world, mine for resources, plant and harvest crops and take part in a wide-range of mini-games and activities! Dazzle friends with rare clothes and complete quests to find rare items!

name: Draculaland
description:
A text adventure adaptation of Dracula, faithfully reimagining several characters and ignoring most of the original plot. Guide Jonathan Harker on a trip through Transylvania, interacting with vampires, mad scientists, zombies, annoying magpies, and moustachioed werewolves.

Uses a mobile-friendly clickable text interface.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 3
description: The island from Chapter 2 has been turned upside down... literally. Step onto the new island and explore every corner of an undiscovered world in Fortnite Chapter 3 Season 1: Flipped.

name: Precursor
description:
Precursor is a mod for Half-Life 2: Episode Two, created by Precursor Team.

It is set in City 17 prior to the events of Half Life 2. You assume the role of a resistance fighter during a Combine crackdown. Your goal is to evade your pursuers and flee the city. At the same time, a mysterious force is working towards ends unknown.

name: Hero of the Kingdom: The Lost Tales 2
description:
Save your city and your people from great evil and become a heroic princess.

You are having a small adventure outside the city walls. You are the princess, in the guise of a rogue. However, returning home is no longer possible. The city is on fire and the streets have been plundered by hordes of unknown monsters. People are leaving their homes in panic and seek refuge from certain doom. But this is your city and your people. You can’t lie idle. You have to protect your city and get allies to fight by your side against great evil. Gain courage and become a heroic princess.

name: Goalkeeper Training VR
description: Sin descripción

name: Deep Down
description:
Firmly sticking to the Half Life 2 formula, Deep Down is a new entry in the story of Alyx and Gordon as they continue the hunt for Combine Advisors in the area surrounding White Forest.

Combine Forces, Zombies and Antlions lay between them and the brooding menace deep below the earth that will test both their skills further than ever before.

If you miss the Half Life 2 formula and are tired of waiting patiently for Episode 3 then this mod is for you. Featuring new gameplay elements, fiendish puzzles and blistering action, Deep Down will provide your Half Life 2 fix (well some of it at least).

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 3: Happy Chaos
description: This allows the character "Happy Chaos" to be used in-game.

name: Nymph's Tower
description: An exploration platformer about scaling a tower and discovering its secrets.

name: DC League of Super-Pets: The Adventures of Krypto and Ace
description:
DC League of Super-Pets: The Adventures of Krypto and Ace is a 2022 video game tie-in to the 2022 movie DC League of Super-Pets.

The player controls Krypto and Ace as they take to the skies to protect the animal population of Metropolis from a new and looming threat.

name: Ball Boys
description: Ball Boys is an online ball-racing championship where you play as a customizable ball and try to score the most points in various parkour challenges. You can roll, double-jump, dash, and maneuver in the air to try and navigate your way through various scenarios.

name: Kuukiyomi
description: What if you could try out exactly how considerate to be in life? Kuukiyomi is a social puzzle game in which players try out different responses to social situations. These range from everyday moments, like making room for others on the bus or standing to one side on the escalator, to wilder and silly choices like performing in sync as a backup dancer or joining a Japanese superhero team. Each situation is presented as a fast minigame, similar to the WarioWare series, with no real explanation; players are left to themselves to judge what it is they need to do. There are 100 minigames in all, and after finishing every game players are given a personality reading based on their performance in various categories such as "social appropriateness" or "reaction speed". After finishing the game once, players unlock the ability to replay any of the stages individually and an endurance competition with three of the different minigames where players have to see how many times they can complete it in a row.

name: Happy Ranch
description:
Welcome to Happy Ranch!
Build the happiest ranch with your new best friends, the QLTONs!
QLTONs are generous spirits that will help make your ranch life more fun!
In Happy Ranch, you’ll harvest crops, produce and trade goods, visit your friends' ranch, take care of cute animals and more!

name: Cave Story MD
description: This is a rewrite/port of the popular freeware game Cave Story for Sega Mega Drive/Genesis.

name: Chicken Attack
description:
Chicken Attack is a single player, 3-D, top-down, isometric game based loosely on the classic Breakout. It is the sequel to the game Chicken's Revenge.

The game features a hen who's out to rescue her chickens which have been captured and imprisoned. To secure their release our heroine fires a ball, 'Breakout style', at everything in her path. This clears the ground uncovers treasure which increases the score, pressure plates that allow her to advance and power-ups that may either help or hinder. All of which, if used carefully, will ultimately enable her to free the chicks. When the last chick has been freed the level is complete.

There are three types of game play, normal, easy and timed, in all the objective is to release the chicks and score points.

The game is entirely mouse controlled.

name: Cop Bastard
description: Cop Bastard - is a сlassic FPS takes place in the early 90s in Japan. Fight against yakuza, and other mobs...

name: Eve: Ghost Enemies
description: This game follows the story of its two protagonists: Kojirou Amagi and Marina Houjou, as they pursue the truth behind another mystery.

name: Eve: Ghost Enemies - Limited Edition
description:
This game follows the story of its two protagonists: Kojirou Amagi and Marina Houjou, as they pursue the truth behind another mystery.

This edition includes the following:
- EVE ghost enemies
- Original Drawing Collection

name: Ys VIII & IX Super Price Set
description: Ys returns with a brand new adventure for the first time in 8 years! Adol awakens shipwrecked and stranded on a cursed island. There, he and the other shipwrecked passengers he rescues form a village to challenge fearsome beasts and mysterious ruins on the isolated island. Amidst this, Adol begins to dream of a mysterious blue-haired maiden living in an unknown world. Join Adol as he unravels the riddle of the cursed isle and the blue-haired maiden Dana in Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of DANA!

name: Metal Dogs: Bow Wow Wonderful Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:

- Metal Dogs
- Tote Bag
- Wonderful Doghouse Limited Edition Box
- Wonderful CD Can Case (Frisbee Style)
- Special Soundtrack
- Special Coasters

name: Foul Airs
description:
Manage your kingdom during a plague in this brief simulator for HyperCard.

This game was made in around 10-12 hours over two days for the Merveilles Hyperjam.

name: Umbral

description: A simple platform game modeled on the theater of shadows.

name: Shadows: Room Escape

name: Keep IT Alive

description: An action-exploration game in a fantasy-modern world.

name: I am Honk
description: Mr Honk awaits you in his quite thick demeanour in speedy word game!

description: Help Mayo the chicken get to space so he can finally fly

name: Boomchick

name: Beaks of Rage
description: An RPG beat-em-up about a regular chicken.

name: The Anarchic Kingdom
description: The Anarchic Kingdom is a simple and fun strategy game written for the DOS. It harks back to the simple BBS door games of the 1980s and 1990s, and even further back to the kingdom management games of the 1960s and 1970s.

name: Chickens Apocalypse
description: Sin descripción

name: Exploding Fish
description: Guide the brave diver Dougal in the depths of the sea. Collect decryption keys to acces and defuse bombs

name: Arapuca
description: A Puzzle game with a mode7 like rotation effect for Mega Drive

description: A nautical adventure involving a compelling voice, particularly impassable rocks, and carnivorous aquatic mammals.

description: Face your worst childhood nightmare!

description: Day of apocalypse:Escape from Earth - a devastating pandemic sweeps through Earth
